channel.title: Some Modelling help please
channel.description:
I've just started a server, but I want to fix some stuff, and meaby create some customs, black phat is glitched, and I want to change that. But I have no idea how to create customs and fix those glitches...(you only see horns and the mouth with blk hween mask :S) One more thing: Could any1 tell me how to open these .dat files??
tyvm

item.title: Some Modelling help please
item.dc:creator: @coolman44445 coolman44445
item.description:
@coolman44445 wrote:

so, ive downloaded some models, put them in class8, item.java and item4.java, compiled it, but when I try to spawn that item, my client crashes :S any help?

Read full topic

item.title: Some Modelling help please
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

  1. you can go to the model section and take some models or you can make them your self.

if you wanted to add more shit to the models you have, then get the model out of the cache and change them around. if you keep the ints ect in your client then when you come back to putting it back in, it will be the same id ect…

Read full topic

item.title: Some Modelling help please
item.dc:creator: @moh moh
item.description:
@moh wrote:

You need to go to moparscape client hack section all you want to know about models is there and , You need to download the model /add in in your item.class go to your server do ::add model (modelid) add it to class 8.

Read full topic
